results.name: Triangle T(n,k) (1 <= k <= n) read by rows: T(n,k) = 1 if k=1 or k=n, else T(n,k) = (3*n-3*k+1)*T(n-1,k-1) + (3*k-2)*T(n-1,k).
comment: Consider the triangle T(n,k) (1<=k<=n) given by T(n, 1) = T(n,n) = 1, otherwise T(n, k) = (m*n-m*k+1)*T(n-1,k-1)+(m*k-m+1)*T(n-1,k).
link: G. Strasser, Generalisation of the Euler adic, Math. Proc. Camb. Phil. Soc. 150 (2010) 241-256, Triangle A_3(n,k).
example: The rows n>=1 and columns 1<=k<=n look as follows:
maple: A142458 := proc(n,k) if n = k then 1; elif k > n or k < 1 then 0 ;else (3*n-3*k+1)*procname(n-1,k-1)+(3*k-2)*procname(n-1,k) ; end if; end proc:
